sentences.sentence: He told her how the boys had set on him, teasing him.
sentences.translation: 他告诉她那些男孩曾是如何攻击他、取笑他的。

sentences.sentence: He was always teasing his sisters.
sentences.translation: 他总是戏弄他的姐妹们。

sentences.sentence: Don't get upset—I was only teasing.
sentences.translation: 别不高兴，我只是在逗你玩。
